sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' function SponserHomeEight() { const [data, setData] = useState({ username: '', email: '', password: '', }) const [error, setError] = useState('') const onHandle = (e) => { const details = { ...data } details[e.target.id] = e.target.value setData(details) } const submitHandle = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() const result = await axios.post('/api/auth/signup', { data }) console.log(result) if (!result.data) setError('Unable to process data') if (result.data.message === 'success') { localStorage.setItem('accessToken', result.data.accessToken) localStorage.setItem('refreshToken', result.data.refreshToken) window.location.assign('http://localhost:3000/dashboard') } else { setError(result.data.message) } } return ( <>
